title: Whats with all the Riven mids?
body:
The whole point of playing Mid is to get away from top lane cancers.

i beat the Rivens of course, but its still cancerous.

Why?

replies.body: Probably Faker played it recently again...
he has done more harm than good for this game...

Unfortunately there is more than winning lane. If u ahead , u should help other lanes to get ur team ahead in gold as well. If she did relatively even and she started to roam around, definetly its not a good sign

I was Taliyah both times, roaming is just how she is meant to be played.
So i roamed a lot more than she did both games.

Riven is just such a cancerous champ to play against
